showCharacter.name: Character Messages

showGM.name: Gamemaster Messages
showGM.hint: Show gamemaster message in window (default: on)

showPlayer.name: Player Messages
showPlayer.hint: Show player message in window (default: off)

showRoll.name: Dice roll Messages
showRoll.hint: Show dice roll message in window (default: off)

showOther.name: Other Messages
showOther.hint: Show other message in window (default: off)

delayTime.name: Time (in milliseconds) to hide
delayTime.hint: Time (in milliseconds) to hide the message window (0: do not hide, default: 10000)

transparent.name: Window transparency (%)
transparent.hint: Transparency of the message window background as a percentage (0: Opaque, 100: Transparent, default: 10)

fontSize.name: Font size (%)
fontSize.hint: Message window font size as a percentage (default: 100)

windowHPosition.name: Horizontal position
windowHPosition.hint: Message window horizontal position (0: bottom, 100: top, default: 50)

windowVPosition.name: Virtical position
windowVPosition.hint: Message window virtical position (0: bottom, 100: top, default: 10)

windowWidth.name: Window width (%)
windowWidth.hint: Message window width as a percentage (default: 100)

windowHeight.name: Window height (%)
windowHeight.hint: Message window height as a percentage (default: 100)

imgTransparent.name: Image transparency (%)
imgTransparent.hint: Transparency of image as a percentage (0: Opaque, 100: Transparent, default: 10)

layoutMenu.name: Window Layout Adjustment
layoutMenu.label: Layout Adjustment
layoutMenu.hint: Adjust the position, size, transparency, font size, and text speed.

layout.previewMessage:
This is a preview display.

You can adjust various settings related to the display of the message window and character images using sliders and numeric inputs.

By starting GUI mode, you can change settings by mouse dragging.

Don't forget to save after making changes!!!
